alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 8:05PM EDT until May 19 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN KNOTT...NORTHEASTERN BREATHITT AND SOUTHEASTERN MAGOFFIN COUNTIES... At 805 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lunah, or 11 miles east of Jackson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Daisydell around 810 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Evanston and Waldo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
